comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: So what happened to Junction Street, North Sydney - buried under Harbour Bridge approaches?

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Found Junction Street on the 1900 North Sydney Map - Between Walker and McDougall Streets, now known as the Pacific Highway - www.nla.gov.au/apps/cdview/?pi=nla.map-rm2358-sd&rgn=...

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: So if junction street is the original road between the corner of blue and walker street,  and the bottom of the hill where the freeway is now,     then it should be steeper than the street shown in this photo is.
